channel.title: Gay Java
channel.description:
[s]I get the following errors when loading a java applet over the web.
[b]several java virtual machines running in the same process caused an error.[/b]
OR
[b]The runtime enviroment has failed to load[/b] ( i forgot how it went, something like that. )
Solution?:
http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6433218
Doesn't work. I changed the parameters to -Xmx500, Half of the memory, it even said a little bit higher than the memory so i put 512. Still the same thing? I updated to JRE 6 Update 2, Still nothing, Same error. Post your thoughts on how to fix this? Thanks.[/s]
It was fixed.

item.title: Gay Java
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[s]I get the following errors when loading a java applet over the web.

several java virtual machines running in the same process caused an error.

OR

The runtime enviroment has failed to load ( i forgot how it went, something like that. )

Solution?:

http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6433218

Doesn’t work. I changed the parameters to -Xmx500, Half of the memory, it even said a little bit higher than the memory so i put 512. Still the same thing? I updated to JRE 6 Update 2, Still nothing, Same error. Post your thoughts on how to fix this? Thanks.[/s]

It was fixed.
